Text: funny side note, anyone else notice that i got copies of Feds never seen on Pirate Bay before?There is a reason, most of these companies hired me for video editting and once i told them the market of about 5 million people resides on this site alone thru torrents quite a few jumping on the bandwagon to compete with WWE and TNA. Anyone can upload a PPV, takes a special breed to edit, compile,render,convert their own footage :P
